name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Mini Window, Live Channels, Top Clips and Schedule

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Twitch streams into any web page you're viewing. Making it easy to watch your favorite streams while browsing or working.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitch Mini Window, Live Channels, Top Clips and Schedule

Hello everyone,

With this extension, you can embed Twitch streams on any web page you visit. Whether you're working, browsing, or just hanging out online, you can keep an eye on your favorite Twitch streams without missing a beat.

Quick note: Version 2.1 is in beta. If you encounter any issues, please let us know.

Why You’ll Love It:

- Stream Anywhere: 
Watch Twitch streams on any website, bringing your favorite live channels wherever you go online.

- Watch Multiple Streams: 
Keep track of one Twitch stream while exploring another, perfect for multi-stream viewing.

- Streamer’s Schedule: 
Access streamers' schedules directly within the extension to never miss a live broadcast.

- Multitasking Magic:
Enjoy Twitch streams while watching YouTube videos or scrolling through social media. Resize and move the mini window to fit your needs.

- Top Clips: 
Stay updated with the top 10 most-watched Twitch clips of the day, all in one convenient spot.

Install the Twitch Mini Window extension now and take your Twitch streaming to the next level!
